title: ENTER_Yamaha-DX7_Collection_for_FM7
description:
This is from the .nfo that came with the download , when I downloaded it from Kazaa many years ago :

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

****Greetings from LiVeMuSiC****

This is a rather LARGE collection of Yamaha DX-7/TX-7 sounds
in .syx (System Exclusive) Format (32 sounds per bank) 
that are now also usable in 
 FM Heaven VSTi !...BUT!... FM Heaven VSTi does NOT emulate THAT well...However...these sounds
should KILL in Native-Instruments FM7 when it's released in May 2001

The "Hollywood Collection" I collected in Hollywood, California
from different studios & musicians when I worked as a messenger for Music Express running for the record companies & movie lots in 1986.

The "Various Other Sources" was collected from musicians & music stores on the road over a span of years.

The "19424 DX-7 SOUNDS" I collected from searches on the internet.

**Notes**
There ARE some banks that are named the same as others (as well as some patches)...BUT...that does NOT necessarily mean the sounds are the same one's! (Tho you will find some here & there) It's gonna take you quite a while to go thru them All...IF you ever do.

  I am sharing this collection in the hope that some will use them to a musical advantage to the world.
  There are some GREAT sounds here!
      
     Enjoy!
   
   LiVeMuSiC

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------


I've just repacked it to make it available again. The .syx files also work in FM8, though FM8 is shipped with so many presets. 

I remember reading that there are about 5000 sounds in this collection .... as the man says Enjoy!
